0U0.F.summary: Fulcrum Utility Services Limited provides multi-utility infrastructure and related services in the United Kingdom. The company operates through two segments, Infrastructure: Design and Build, and Utility assets: Own and Operate. It designs and builds gas and electricity connections for housing, and industrial and commercial developments; and EV charging, gas, and electricity distribution infrastructures. The company also offers meter exchange and meter ownership services, as well as smart meter exchange programs and utility infrastructure asset services. In addition, it provides renewable electrical connections; and engages in the maintenance of electrical systems and renewable energy generating infrastructure. Further, the company offers gas transportation services. Fulcrum Utility Services Limited was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Sheffield, the United Kingdom.

4PD1.F.summary: InfraStrata plc, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a gas storage company. It engages in the energy infrastructure development and operation of gas storage project at Islandmagee in County Antrim in Northern Ireland. The company was formerly known as Portland Gas plc and changed its name to InfraStrata plc in December 2009. InfraStrata plc was incorporated in 2007 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
